response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for us at $1,500,000. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to you, we propose to offer this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects our commitment to ensuring that you receive unparalleled value while also maximizing our return on investment. We look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.", "product_price": 1200000}
